title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Management
summary: Implement a robust multi-factor authentication system to secure user access.
description: Develop a secure login system leveraging multi-factor authentication (MFA) with options such as passwords, OTPs, and biometric methods to ensure secure user access. Integrate advanced session management and timeout controls, along with encryption protocols for data in transit and at rest. This feature must comply with industry security and privacy standards, ensuring authentication aligns with banking compliance requirements.

title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
summary: Design and develop a responsive, personalized user dashboard for seamless banking access.
description: Create a user-friendly, device-responsive interface providing consistent user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The personalized dashboard should dynamically display relevant banking products, accounts, and services based on a customer's profile and eligibility. Focus on accessibility, intuitive navigation, and modern design principles to enhance user engagement and satisfaction.

title: Core Banking Integration and Local Data Management
summary: Enable secure integration with the bankâ€™s core system and implement a dedicated database for performance.
description: Design and implement an integration layer to connect the portal with the existing core banking infrastructure using secure APIs. Develop a local, optimized database to offload non-critical operations for better performance while maintaining synchronization rules between systems. Implement robust error handling, transaction auditing, and monitoring mechanisms to ensure data accuracy and high availability.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Implement guided digital workflows for account openings and service modification requests.
description: Build structured, user-driven workflows allowing customers to initiate and complete account opening and service modification requests online. Include inline validation, progress tracking, and auto-saving of incomplete applications. Ensure integration with backend systems for automated processing and minimal manual intervention, improving end-to-end efficiency and reducing turnaround time.

title: Document Upload and Management System
summary: Develop a secure digital document management component to support user submissions.
description: Create a document upload module enabling customers to attach required documents, such as identity proofs, through the portal. Include file format validation, encryption, and secure storage. Implement document tracking, re-upload options, and linkage to relevant applications. Integrate automated document verification or manual review workflows to expedite approval processes.

title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notification Mechanism
summary: Provide automated real-time request tracking and notifications for customers.
description: Implement a real-time tracking system for user requests and applications. Integrate automated notifications for status changes through email and optional SMS updates. Introduce a notification center within the portal to keep all updates accessible. Ensure message delivery reliability using event-based architecture and maintain a consistent user communication experience.

title: User Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain detailed records of user interactions and financial activities within the portal.
description: Develop an audit and history engine to record and display all user interactions, requests, and service modifications. Allow customers to view historical requests and transaction summaries within their account interface. Implement full traceability and ensure immutable recordkeeping for compliance and internal audits, enforcing secure and tamper-proof activity logging.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) System
summary: Enforce secure and granular access management across user profiles and authorization levels.
description: Implement a role-based access control framework that defines user roles, privileges, and permissible actions within the portal. Ensure that users can only view and access data and services consistent with their profile and authorization level. Integrate centralized access management and auditing capabilities to maintain compliance with security and regulatory standards.

title: Data Security, Privacy, and Compliance Framework
summary: Strengthen data security protocols and enforce compliance with financial regulations.
description: Develop and implement comprehensive security policies covering encryption, intrusion detection, and continuous monitoring. Ensure full compliance with banking and data privacy regulations such as GDPR, PCI DSS, or regional equivalents. Conduct regular penetration testing, enable incident response workflows, and enforce strict access controls to safeguard sensitive financial data and maintain system trustworthiness.
